# <a name="saving-messages-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0868-102">Sõnumite salvestamine Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0868-102">Saving messages in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0868-103">E-kirju ei saa salvestada Outlook.com, kuid saate need printida PDF-failile, mille saate ARVUTISSE salvestada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0868-103">You cannot save email messages in Outlook.com, but you can print them to a PDF which you can save on your PC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0868-104">Windows 10-s sisalduva Microsoft Print to PDF-i utiliit võimaldab printida e-kirja otse PDF-failile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0868-104">The Microsoft Print To PDF utility included in Windows 10 allows you to print any email message directly to a PDF.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="f0868-105">Valige sõnum, mida soovite salvestada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0868-105">Select the message you want to save.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="f0868-106">Valige kolm punkti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0868-106">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="f0868-107">sõnumi ülaosas ja seejärel valige</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0868-107">at the top of the message and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="f0868-108">**Printida**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0868-108">**Print**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="f0868-109">Valige **Prindi** uuesti ja valige printeri rippmenüüs suvand **Microsoft Print PDF-iks**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0868-109">Select **Print** again, and from the printer drop-down menu, select **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="f0868-110">Valige **Prindi**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0868-110">Select **Print**.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="f0868-111">Sisestage faili nimi ja valige siis **Salvesta**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0868-111">Enter a file name then select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0868-112">**Märkus:** Seda ei soovitata kasutada ühistel või avalikes arvutites, kuna teistel kasutajatel võib olla juurdepääs kõigile teie ARVUTISSE salvestatavale PDF-failidele ja neid ei kustutata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0868-112">**Note:** This is not recommended on shared or public computers as other users could have access to any PDFs you save to the PC and don't delete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0868-113">Printimise kohta lisateabe saamiseks vt teemat [Prindi e-kirjad, manused ja kalendrid Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0868-113">For more information about printing, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
